Header: European Union Delegates Call on Jaffna Commander
Content: The Ambassador of the European Union (EU) for Sri Lanka and the Maldives, H.E Mr Denis Chaibi and a delegation during a visit to the North paid a courtesy call on the Commander, Security Forces, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya on Thursday (16) at the Security Force HQ-J premises. The delegation discussed matters pertaining to the land release process, resettlement and de-mining processes in the Jaffna peninsula during the interactive meeting. The Commander Security Forces - Jaffna presented a comprehensive account on the status quo and community-oriented projects, being carried out by the troops in the peninsula and a memento to the Ambassador before he left the premises.
